segments.text: I'm examining the finer details of this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The division of the window panes into small squares is quite precise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the curtains are tied back so neatly, allowing all the light in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how the tidy garden outside offers such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the specific labeling on the cookie jar, "COOKIE JAR," almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how much is going on that the woman simply doesn't register.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutral expression is particularly striking given the circumstances.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the specific way the water is sheeting over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's not just dripping; it's a solid, continuous flow onto the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The fact that the stool's legs are visibly splayed makes its instability very clear.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost unbelievable that she hasn't felt the water around her foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The subtle domestic details really highlight the impending drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just surprised by the sheer number of unnoticed hazards in one small space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every glance reveals another small detail that adds to the overall tension.
segments.speaker: PAR
